SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into eb_store_coupon (id, title, integral, coupon_price, use_min_price, user_level, use_limit_number, validity_type, fixed_begin_time, fixed_end_time, use_type, access_type, coupon_time, sort, status, add_time, is_del, ctime ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{integral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{couponPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{useMinPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{userLevel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{useLimitNumber,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{validityType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{fixedBeginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fixedEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{useType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{accessType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{couponTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{addTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDel,jdbcType=BIT}, #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update eb_store_coupon set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, integral = #{integral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, coupon_price = #{couponPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, use_min_price = #{useMinPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, user_level = #{userLevel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, use_limit_number = #{useLimitNumber,jdbcType=TINYINT}, validity_type = #{validityType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, fixed_begin_time = #{fixedBeginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fixed_end_time = #{fixedEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, use_type = #{useType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, access_type = #{accessType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, coupon_time = #{couponTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=BIT}, ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, title, integral, coupon_price, use_min_price, user_level, use_limit_number, validity_type, fixed_begin_time, fixed_end_time, use_type, access_type, coupon_time, sort, status, add_time, is_del, ctime from eb_store_coupon where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
